import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { actToggle } from '../redux/actions' import { toggleSelector } from '../redux/selector' export default function Control() { const toggle = useSelector(toggleSelector) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleAddStudent = () => { const action = "ADD" dispatch(actToggle(action)) } return (
) }
